name: RITA Translator
description: RITA Discord Translator Bot. Providing translation services with many uses to connect communities. A 100% open-source and free project.

DISCORD_TOKEN.description: The login token to your bot!  Find this at https://discord.com/developers/applications

DISCORD_DEBUG_WEBHOOK_ID.description: Enter the ID for Webhook Debug logging, This is for sending log and error messages to a designated channel, however it is not needed , it's only for debugging, if you wish to turn it on later in the future you can do so in the Environment Variables tab in App Settings. Refer to https://ritabot.org/troubleshooting/ for help

DISCORD_DEBUG_WEBHOOK_TOKEN.description: Enter the Token for Webhook Debug logging. This is for sending log and error messages to a designated channel, however it is not needed , it's only for debugging, if you wish to turn it on later in the future you can do so in the Environment Variables tab in App Settings. Refer to https://ritabot.org/troubleshooting/ for help

NODE_MODULES_CACHE.description: This is to ensure that when the bot updates it does not use any old Dependencies that Heroku has stored and gets fresh ones from the package.json file. Please never change this or else updates we add to dependencies (google-translate-api , google-translate-token) will not take into effect on your bot.
